description: This file defines the IOttServices interface within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It declares pure virtual methods for pinging the service, retrieving permissions, invalidating cached permissions, and updating permissions for a specified application ID.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface for OttServices providing methods to interact with permissions and connectivity checks.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Sends a message to the service and gets an echo reply.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions associated with an application ID as a JSON string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for the specified application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Refreshes permissions from remote service and updates cache for the specified application ID.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
